New Records: Evin Lewis scored his first ODI century since July 2021 and his third against Sri Lanka, reaching 102 not out
Key Match Events: The match was reduced to 23 overs due to a five-hour rain stoppage
West Indies achieved an eight-wicket win via the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern (DLS) Method
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a consolation win for the West Indies in the series
Sherfane Rutherford scored his third straight fifty in the series
Others: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 23 overs per side
